name: drawStrikethrough(forGlyphRange:strikethroughType:baselineOffset:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:)
desc: Draws a strikethrough for the specified glyphs.
declaration:
func drawStrikethrough(forGlyphRange glyphRange: NSRange, 
     strikethroughType strikethroughVal: NSUnderlineStyle, 
        baselineOffset: CGFloat, 
      lineFragmentRect lineRect: CGRect, 
lineFragmentGlyphRange lineGlyphRange: NSRange, 
       containerOrigin: CGPoint)
